comments:
I'm getting the following log when I tried to start the Eclipse.
Any idea why? Am I missing something?

!SESSION Mar 15, 2005 10:08:55.14 ----------------------------------------------
eclipse.buildId=M200409161125
java.fullversion=J2RE 1.4.2 IBM AIX 5L for PowerPC (64 bit JVM) build
caix64142sr1a-20050209 (JIT enabled: jitc)
BootLoader constants: OS=aix, ARCH=ppc, WS=motif, NL=en_US

!ENTRY org.eclipse.osgi Mar 15, 2005 10:08:55.18
!MESSAGE Application error
!STACK 1
java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError
        at org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Device.<clinit>(Device.java:89)
        at org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench.createDisplay(Workbench.java:268)
        at org.eclipse.ui.PlatformUI.createDisplay(PlatformUI.java:153)

org.eclipse.ui.internal.ide.IDEApplication.createDisplay(IDEApplication.java:122)

        at
org.eclipse.core.runtime.adaptor.EclipseStarter.run(EclipseStarter.java:273)

org.eclipse.core.runtime.adaptor.EclipseStarter.run(EclipseStarter.java:129)

sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:85)
        at
sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:58)
        at
sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:60)
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:391)
        at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.basicRun(Main.java:185)
        at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.run(Main.java:704)
        at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.main(Main.java:688)
Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadLibrary0(ClassLoader.java:2159)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadLibrary(ClassLoader.java:1976)
        at java.lang.Runtime.loadLibrary0(Runtime.java:824)

        at org.eclipse.swt.internal.Library.loadLibrary(Library.java:100)
        at org.eclipse.swt.internal.motif.OS.<clinit>(OS.java:20)
        ... 16 more
It works if I use JRE 32 bit version 1.4.2 from IBM

problem; bug 46010 has a similar cause on AIX.
Changing report status since it's a jre issue.
